history.narrative: Law 19-258, the “Ignition Interlock Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-673. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012, and Dec. 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 9, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-610 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-258 became effective on Apr. 20, 2013.
